column4: I've another question for you. I'm looking at the server edition. Is there something like landscape, but free? (as I'm setting up my home server for some try I cannot afford to pay for it :( )
puppet or chef should be able to help you synchronize configuration. Nagios and cacti can do monitoring and graphing
ok, thank you, I'll look at them
ah, if you want 'just a webinterface', erUSUL gave the correct answer :)
